# Load Text
<!--
@name: Load Text
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
<div class="compatibility"><span>Compatibility</span><img src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/common/compatibility/aoz_logo.png" valign="center" alt="AOZ" title="AOZ" /></div>


Load an ascii file into a string
## Parameters


- **path&dollar;**: Path to the text to load
- **string&dollar;**: The string in which to load
